options.name: Spectral Weapon
options.description: You designate a Light 1 or 2 Handed Melee Weapon as your Spectral Weapon with a 1 Hour Ritual. This weapon can be summoned and dismissed as a Free Action. If you throw this weapon, it appears in your hand after hitting or missing your target.

options.name: Spectral Twin
options.description: You can designate a second Weapon as a Spectral Weapon which behaves in the same manner. With a Free Action, you can summon one or both Spectral Weapon.

options.name: Ethereal Weapons
options.description: Your Spectral Weapons deal an extra 1d4 Psychic Damage. This dice increases to 1d8 at level 7, and 2d6 at level 10

options.name: Reaction : Spectral Parry
options.description: When you are Attacked by a Melee Weapon, you can summon a brief duplicate of your Spectral Weapon to attempt to Parry the Attack. Roll a 1d6 and add that to your Block Modifier.

options.name: Action : Psychic Onslaught
options.description: Until the end of your next turn, the Primary Damage of your Spectral Weapons are convereted to Psychic Damage.

options.name: Action : Phantom Rush
options.description: Your Spectral Weapon appears Adjacent to a Target within 6 Units. If your Attack hits, you dash to your weapon if nothing is obstructing your path. Otherwise, you remain in your current position.
